commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0: Rename chatbot and add greeting
Level-1: Implement echo and bye command
commitResults.messageBody:
Adds a loop that reads user input and echoes it back to the user.
Exits when the user types 'bye'. Adds horizontal lines and leading
spaces to match the sample chat formatting.
Add the ability to store whatever text entered by the user and display them back to the user when requested.

Add the ability to mark tasks as done and added the ability to change the status back to not done.
Used a class to represent tasks.

Add the ability to mark tasks as done and added the ability to change the status back to not done.
Used a class to represent tasks.
Added bounds for marking and unmarking for edge cases.

Add support for tracking three types of tasks:
	1. ToDos: tasks without any date/time attached to it e.g., visit new theme park
	2. Deadlines: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time e.g., submit report by 11/10/2019 5pm
	3. Events: tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at a specific date/time

Added fixes for edge cases. e.g., "mark abc".

Added checks for blank descriptions/tasks.

Use the input/output redirection technique to semi-automate the testing of Duke.
Added test cases into the expected and actual.txt file.
Added a DukeException class to handle exceptions.

Added support for deleting tasks from the list.
Changed from a fixed sized array to an arraylist to store tasks.
Added test cases for delete command in the input.txt file.
